name: MeasurementPeriod
description: Embedded information used inside proposals to define which type of experiment as to be pursued where (at which intrument) and when.

id.description: id currently needed by limitation in embedsmanny

instrument.description: Instrument or beamline identifier where measurement was pursued, e.g. /PSI/SLS/TOMCAT

start.description: Time when measurement period started, format according to chapter 5.6 internet date/time format in RFC 3339. Local times without timezone/offset info are automatically transformed to UTC using the timezone of the API server

end.description: Time when measurement period ended, format according to chapter 5.6 internet date/time format in RFC 3339. Local times without timezone/offset info are automatically transformed to UTC using the timezone of the API server

comment.description: Additional information relevant for this measurement period, e.g. if different accounts were used for data taking
